mapper.sql: id, openid, name, avatar, gender, college, major, phone, first_dep, second_dep, introduction, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into form (id, openid, name, avatar, gender, college, major, phone, first_dep, second_dep,introduction, create_time, update_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{college,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstDep,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{secondDep,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{introduction,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into form
id,
openid,
name,
avatar,
gender,

major,

introduction,

SELECT
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gender,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{college,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{firstDep,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{secondDep,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{introduction,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM form where openid = openid)
